name: Association of Business Recovery Professionals
goal: R3 is the trade association for the UK?s insolvency, restructuring, advisory, and turnaround professionals. We represent insolvency practitioners, lawyers, turnaround and restructuring experts, students, and others in the profession.
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights
euInitiatives: Capital Markets Union; retail financial services; EC Regulation on insolvency; legislation on insolvency.
